message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, even more so than my asking price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high. Could we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500?
